util

Class IOUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.IOUtil

  • public class IOUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a utility class for DFS I/O. This class provide the following several methods : writeFile(String s), readFile(String filename), writeBinary(byte[] bytes), readBinary(String filename), writeObject(Object object), readConfig(String path)
    Author:
    menglonghe, sidilin

      • calculateFileSplit

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> calculateFileSplit(java.lang.String filePath,
                                                     int chunkSize)
                                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Calculate how many splits are there for a specific file. It contains the starting point and EOF.
        Parameters:
        filePath - String The path of the file.
        chunkSize - String The chunk size to be used.
        Returns:
        ArrayList An array indicates all the offsets of start points of chunks.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
